home.name: My name is
home.profession: I am working as a software developer for
home.specialty: years, specializing in full-stack web development with the accent on the backbone of the applications. On the backend side I usually work with Java and Spring Boot, while on the frontend side I prefer working with Angular.
home.site: During my time spent on the internet, I saw a lot of different web page designs, static sites etc., and it always surprised me how bloated they are, having weird designs and unoptimized interfaces. I had some free time at my hand, and decided to make a simple profile for myself attempting to make it interactive while keeping it simple design-wise and lightweight resource-wise.
home.opinions: A site should have decent contrast, easy to read text, clean and simple layout. The animations should have smooth transitions. If it can be written as a simple single page app, it should be written as one. The payload for the static files should not be over 1 mb, and should pass all the tests with an OK score.

about.colorInspiration: The colors used on this page were inspired by the

manifesto.title: Manifesto
manifesto.description: In recent years, content farming with tech blogs rose by a visible amount, which resulted in lower quality of information, having some code snippets that do not even work, text that is clearly written by AI. Furthermore, a lot of the content is replicated from other sources without any attribution. In this blog I personally guarantee that I post things I have tried and implemented in prototypes or in production at some point where they worked for me, they are the result of my own work and research, omitting the details that are not in the scope of the subject or is project-related information, while making it as close to a working example as possible. Although I try my best, I cannot guarantee that I can update and keep the informations in a working state. If you want to support my work, please share and refer the post you found useful with the link pointing to my post, and my name (Jakab Szilárd).

motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.description: During my years in the IT field, I wrote a lot of documentation reasoning on why I choose certain technologies, libraries, and solutions. I also held some presentations across multiple teams regarding a range of topics. They started to add up, and I've realised they do not have any value sitting on my computer, so I decided to rewrite them in my spare time to a format in which I can make it public, benefitting some people that might end up trying to do the same research as I did.

master.thesis: BrailleAssist - An application to help in the education of visually impaired people

nokia.name: Nokia Solutions and Networks KFT.
nokia.description: Automated deployments of telecommunication services in an OpenStack cloud, making a specialized GUI to customize the deployments more easily.

boschWS.name: Robert Bosch SRL
boschWS.description: Worked on a desktop application written with Java and Java Swing. The mapped functions, modules, their input and output to the pins of the microcontrollers inside an ECU. I was responsible for maintenance and developing new features.

bosch.name: Robert Bosch SRL
bosch.description: Working as a full-stack developer on internal tools and applications used within the company by hundreds of engineers, using Java, Spring Boot, Angular, Github Actions, and other related technologies.
